com.ebay.lightning.client

Interface LightningClient

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LightningClient.LightningClientImpl

    public interface LightningClient
    LightningClient provides the interface for users to submit requests, poll response, see audit data etc to/from lightning core. Additionally, the interface provides functionality to read and update configuration at runtime.
    Author:
    shashukla
    See Also:
    LightningClient.LightningClientImpl

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  LightningClient.LightningClientImpl
      LightningClientImpl is the one and only implementation of LightningClient as of version 1.0 This class is package protected to discourage direct instantiation.

    • Method Detail

      • submit

        com.ebay.lightning.core.beans.LightningRequest submit(List<com.ebay.lightning.core.beans.Task> tasks)
        Submit a list of tasks to be executed asynchronously at high speed.
        Parameters:
        tasks - list of Task to be executed asynchronously
        Returns:
        LightningRequest that contain sessionId, ReservationReceipt etc

      • submit

        com.ebay.lightning.core.beans.LightningRequest submit(List<com.ebay.lightning.core.beans.Task> tasks,
                                                      com.ebay.lightning.core.config.RequestConfig requestconfig)
        Submit a list of tasks to be executed asynchronously and configuration parameters.
        Parameters:
        tasks - list of Task to be executed asynchronously
        requestconfig - configuration parameters to execute the task
        Returns:
        LightningRequest that contain sessionId, ReservationReceipt etc

      • submitWithCallback

        void submitWithCallback(List<com.ebay.lightning.core.beans.Task> tasks,
                        LightningResponseCallback callback,
                        long timeoutInMillis)
        Submit a list of tasks to be executed asynchronously at high speed.
        Parameters:
        tasks - list of Task to be executed asynchronously
        callback - LightningResponseCallback to invoke on completion of request or timeout.
        timeoutInMillis - timeout for callback

      • submitWithCallback

                        com.ebay.lightning.core.config.RequestConfig requestconfig,
                        LightningResponseCallback callback,
                        long timeoutInMillis)

        Parameters:
        tasks - list of Task to be executed asynchronously
        requestconfig - configuration parameters to execute the task
        callback - LightningResponseCallback to invoke on completion of request or timeout.
        timeoutInMillis - timeout for callback

      • pollResponse

        com.ebay.lightning.core.beans.LightningResponse pollResponse(com.ebay.lightning.core.beans.LightningRequest req,
                                                             boolean pollDeltaOnly)
        Poll the current result for request. The method returns the complete or partial response based on the current state of the request.
        Parameters:
        req - the LightningRequest object returned by submit(List) method
        pollDeltaOnly - get full or delta response
        Returns:
        LightningResponse that has the current state of task execution

      • getAuditReport

        com.ebay.lightning.core.store.LightningRequestReport getAuditReport(com.ebay.lightning.core.beans.LightningRequest req)
        Get the detailed execution report for the request in compressed format. This method is usually called after the complete execution of the request. The execution state of the method can be polled with pollResponse(LightningRequest, boolean) method.
        Parameters:
        req - the LightningRequest object returned by submit(List) method
        Returns:
        LightningRequestReport that has the detailed execution report

      • getAuditReport

        com.ebay.lightning.core.store.LightningRequestReport getAuditReport(String sessionId,
                                                                    String servingHostIp)
        Get the detailed execution report for the request in compressed format. This method is usually called after the complete execution of the request. The execution state of the method can be polled with pollResponse(LightningRequest, boolean) method.
        Parameters:
        sessionId - the sessionId from LightningRequest
        servingHostIp - the lightning core host that executed the task with the specific sessionId
        Returns:
        LightningRequestReport that has the detailed execution report in compressed format

      • getAuditJsonReport

        com.ebay.lightning.core.store.LightningRequestReport getAuditJsonReport(String sessionId,
                                                                        String servingHostIp)
        Get the detailed execution report for the request in JSON format. This method is usually called after the complete execution of the request. The execution state of the method can be polled with pollResponse(LightningRequest, boolean) method.
        Parameters:
        sessionId - the sessionId from LightningRequest
        servingHostIp - the lightning core host that executed the task with the specific sessionId
        Returns:
        LightningRequestReport that has the detailed execution report in JSON format

      • getAuditSummary

        List<com.ebay.lightning.core.store.LightningRequestReport> getAuditSummary(String servingHostIp,
                                                                           String sessionId)
        Get all detailed execution report in compressed format.
        Parameters:
        sessionId - the sessionId from LightningRequest
        servingHostIp - the lightning core host for which audit summary need to be fetched
        Returns:
        list of LightningRequestReport that has the all detailed execution report in compressed format

      • updateSystemConfig

        com.ebay.lightning.core.config.SystemConfig updateSystemConfig(String servingHostIp,
                                                               com.ebay.lightning.core.config.SystemConfig config)
        Update system configuration parameters.
        Parameters:
        servingHostIp - the lightning core instance that has to be updated
        config - the new SystemConfig parameters
        Returns:
        the SystemConfig instance after update

      • getSystemConfig

        com.ebay.lightning.core.config.SystemConfig getSystemConfig(String servingHostIp)
        Get the system configuration parameters.
        Parameters:
        servingHostIp - the lightning core instance for which the parameters has to be fetched
        Returns:
        the current SystemConfig instance of the host represented by servingHostIp

      • getLightningStats

        com.ebay.lightning.core.beans.SystemStatus getLightningStats(String servingHostIp)
        Get the lighting statistics.
        Parameters:
        servingHostIp - the lightning core instance for which lightning statistics has to be fetched
        Returns:
        the current SystemStatus instance of the host represented by servingHostIp

      • getConfig

        LightningClientConfig getConfig()
        Get the lighting client configuration.
        Returns:
        the lightning client configuration LightningClientConfig
